Class Tetris

extends Object
    Main class for Tetris app.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Main creates the UI object (JavaFX Application) and waits for the UI to show. After that the thread exits as JavaFX runs in a separate thread.
        Parameters:
        args - - not yet used

      • exitTetris

        public static void exitTetris()
        Clean up and exit the application

      • fatalError

        public static void fatalError(String message)
        Called when there is an unexpected unrecoverable error.
        Prints a stack trace together with a provided message.
        Terminates with exit(1).
        Parameters:
        message - to be displayed with the exception message

      • criticalError

        public static void criticalError(String message)
        Called when there is an unexpected but recoverable error.
        Prints a stack trace together with a provided message.
        Parameters:
        message - to be displayed with the exception message
